00483 void
00484 ISABMonitor::
00485 wait()
00486 {
00487    while( true ){
00488       try{
00489          JTCMonitor::wait();
00490          return;
00491       }
00492       catch( const JTCException& e ){
00493          mc2log << warn << "ISABMonitor::wait " << endl << e << endl;
00494       }
00495    }
00496 }
00497 
00498 void
00499 ISABMonitor::
00500 wait(long timeout)
00501 {
00502    while( true ){
00503       try{
00504          JTCMonitor::wait(timeout);
00505          return;
00506       }
00507       catch( const JTCException& e ){
00508          mc2log << warn << "ISABMonitor::wait(long) " << endl << e << endl; 
00509       }
00510    }
00511 }

00554 void
00555 ISABThreadGroup::uncaughtException(JTCThreadHandle t, 
00556                                    const JTCException& e)
00557 {
00558    mc2log << fatal << "ISABThreadGroup::uncaughtJTCException " << e << endl;
00559    SysUtility::dumpProcessInfo();
00560    exit(2);
00561 }
00562 
00563 
00564 void
00565 ISABThreadGroup::uncaughtException(JTCThreadHandle t) {
00566    mc2log << fatal << "ISABThreadGroup::uncaughtException " << strerror(errno) 
00567           << endl;
00568    SysUtility::dumpProcessInfo();
00569    exit(2);
00570 }

00572 inline ISABThreadGroupHandle
00573 ISABThreadGroup::getParent() const {
00574    return ISABThreadGroupHandle( 
00575       static_cast< ISABThreadGroup* > ( JTCThreadGroup::getParent().get() 
00576                                         ) );
00577 }
